plugins.name: FontLang Switcher
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma designs with ease! This plugin combines three essential features into one convenient tool:


🌐 Translate Text – Instantly translate your design’s text content into various languages. Ideal for multilingual design projects.


🔤 Replace Fonts – Quickly swap fonts across your designs, making global typography updates a breeze.


🔄 Mirror Elements – Flip or mirror design elements horizontally for right-to-left (RTL) support or layout variations.


Why you’ll love this plugin:

✅ Save time on manual updates

✅ Enhance global design workflows

✅ Streamline font management and layout adjustments

Perfect for designers working on international products, multilingual interfaces, and adaptable layouts.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Text Translation, Font Replacement & Mirroring – All in One Plugin

136554.name: FontLang Switcher
136554.description:

plugins.name: PrevGen
plugins.description:
PREVGEN - MICROSTOCK PREVIEW GENERATOR

=======================================


🎯 WHAT IS PREVGEN?

PrevGen is a specialized Figma plugin designed exclusively for microstock creators who need to generate hundreds of design previews quickly and efficiently. Stop spending hours creating mockups one by one - automate your entire preview generation workflow.


⚡ HOW IT WORKS:

1. CREATE TEMPLATE

- Design your preview template in Figma

- Use built-in templates (Freepik, Envato, DepositPhotos formats)

- Mark container layers for your designs


2. UPLOAD DESIGNS

- Drag & drop PNG, JPG, SVG files

- Auto-trim PNG transparency (optional)

- Batch process multiple files


3. CONFIGURE LAYOUT

- Choose: Horizontal, Vertical, or Grid layout

- Auto-spacing and alignment

- Fit or Fill image scaling options


4. CUSTOMIZE CONTENT

- Auto-replace text with filenames

- Apply custom colors to layers

- Bulk background color changes


5. GENERATE PREVIEWS

- Mass generate all previews instantly

- Auto-naming with prefix/suffix options

- Perfect positioning and spacing


✨ KEY FEATURES:

===============

- TEMPLATE SYSTEM - Built-in templates for major microstock platforms

- BATCH PROCESSING - Upload and process multiple designs at once

- AUTO LAYOUT - Smart positioning with customizable spacing

- TEXT AUTOMATION - Auto-replace text layers with design names

- COLOR MAPPING - Apply custom colors to specific layers

- PNG OPTIMIZATION - Auto-trim transparent areas

- FLEXIBLE SCALING - Fit or Fill image modes

- BULK OPERATIONS - Generate hundreds of previews in one click


🎨 SUPPORTED FORMATS:

====================

- PNG (with transparency trimming)

- JPG/JPEG


📐 BUILT-IN TEMPLATES:

=====================

- Freepik: Landscape (4500×3000), Portrait (3000×4500), Square (3500×3500)

- Envato Elements: Main Image (2340×1560), Secondary (2340×1500)

- DepositPhotos: Landscape (4500×3000), Portrait (3000×4500), Square (3500×3500)


🚀 PERFECT FOR:

===============

- Stock designers creating portfolio previews

- Microstock contributors preparing submissions

- Design agencies showcasing client work

- Freelancers building presentation materials

- Anyone needing bulk design mockups


💡 USE CASES:

=============

- Create portfolio previews for Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, Getty Images

- Generate client presentation mockups

- Build design showcase galleries

- Prepare submission previews for stock platforms

- Automate repetitive design tasks


🎯 WHO BENEFITS:

===============

- Microstock photographers and designers

- Stock content contributors

- Digital design agencies

- Freelance graphic designers

- Portfolio creators


💝 PRICING:

===========

100% FREE for microstock creators and designers

No hidden fees, no subscriptions, no limitations


🛠️ TECHNICAL SPECS:

==================

- Works with Figma Desktop and Web

- No external dependencies

- Processes files locally (secure)

- Supports unlimited file uploads

- Auto-saves plugin settings


📞 SUPPORT & CONTACT:

====================

- Bug Reports: yasadesign.work@gmail.com


💖 SUPPORT DEVELOPMENT:

======================

Love PrevGen? Support continued development:

PayPal


Thanks for

YASA Design Studio
plugins.tagline: Generate Microstock Previews in Seconds, Not Hours

plugins.name: Layer Organizer
plugins.description:
Layer Organizer

Is your Figma file a mess? Layers all over the place? Layer Organizer instantly organizes, groups, and aligns your selected layers — with real-time visual feedback.


🚀 Core Features:

  1. Auto Layer Organization: Instantly arranges and aligns selected layers for a clean, structured layout.
  2. Group Level Selection (1–5): Groups layers based on / in their names (e.g., Button/Primary), supporting deep hierarchies.
  3. Horizontal & Vertical Spacing: Set precise spacing between groups and layers. Quick presets: 200px, 400px, 1000px.
  4. Combine Single Layers: Merge single-layer groups into one clean “Ungrouped” group. Toggleable.


👀 Preview & Visualization:

  1. Real-Time Preview: See changes instantly as you organize.
  2. Group View: Visual list of group names and included layers, with type labels (Frame, Component, Vector, etc.).


⚙️ Settings & Shortcuts:

  1. Preference Memory: Automatically remembers your last settings for a smoother workflow.
  2. Default Values: Horizontal/Vertical spacing: 100px, Group level: 1, Combine single-layer groups: On.


⚡ Performance-First Architecture:

  1. Two-Stage Processing: Measures first, positions after — for faster, more accurate results.
  2. Safe Layer Sorting: Uses a temporary frame to reorder layers while preserving hierarchy and structure.


Organize! Preview! Perfect! 🧼
plugins.tagline: Auto-arrange and group layers for a cleaner, more organized Figma canvas. 🧼

plugins.name: 10x HTML | Design to clean responsive code 10x faster
plugins.description:
⚡️ Instantly turn your Figma design into clean, responsive HTML / CSS / SCSS

🚀 No registration, no paywall, click and get your code

🔍 Preview / inspect the generated code in Figma

⚡️ Test responsiveness and make live adjustments

🎓 Smart layout and naming



Who is it for ?


  1. Beginner looking to turn a design into a website starting from a clean structure where 90% of the work is already handled


  1. Advanced front-end developers looking to drastically speed up their workflow without compromising on the structure and readability of their code.


No registration required - run the plugin, select a frame and preview the result in a single click.

Works in design mode only (for now, but let us know if you're interested for dev mode)



What is 10x HTML ?


Most design-to-code tools generate bloated or messy output, with non optimized layout.

That’s because extracting logic from a visual design — especially an unstructured one — is a hard problem..


10x HTML was built from the ground up with the clear goal of solving those issues with smart rules and layout inference.


We focus on :

- Understanding layout intent

- Reducing unnecessary nesting

- Recognizing repeated patterns (even copy-pasted ones)

- Grouping elements intelligently

- and more...


10x HTML doesn't claim to replace a frontend developer — but it dramatically accelerates your workflow by giving you clean, factorized and structured code that you can build on.


Whether you're a beginner or an experienced front-end developer, 10xHTML is designed to handle most of the heavy lifting for you—making smart assumptions when needed and delivering perfect code with clear naming and structure that’s easy to build upon.


Clean, semantic code – without the mess

- Converts buttons, inputs, headers, and more into proper HTML elements

- Uses a smart class system: base classes, modifiers, and utilities based on context

- Picks optimized class names

- Flattens overly nested layers


Smart, responsive export

- Fully responsive by default — includes media and container queries

- Detects and links similar elements, even without components

- Intelligently groups and infers layout, even from unstructured designs


Live code and layout inspection

- Preview the final webpage right in Figma

- Test responsiveness

- Do live update to adjust the code

- Download the code and get ready for production


How to reach out ?

💬 Request support here

💡 Suggest an improvement here

🕷 Report a bug here

🚀 Join our Discord for support, feedback or questions..


⚠️ Note :

10x HTML is currently free and fully accessible as a Beta version.

We are trying to gather as much feedback as possible, so please feel free to post any kind of comments (bug report, idea, opinion...)

Once we reach the level of maturity we’re aiming for, we will switch to a paid model

(with very reasonable pricing)
plugins.tagline: Convert your design to high quality HTML / CSS / SCSS in one click and download your code.

plugins.name: Yet Another Design Linter
plugins.description:
✨ Yet Another Design Linter (YADL): Your Design System's Enforcer

YADL is the essential Figma plugin for teams who care about consistency, scalability, and design system integrity. Automate linting, enforce variable use, and ship cleaner designs—fast.


🚀 Why use it?

Design systems aren't just style guides—they're contracts. YADL automates enforcing those contracts so you're not stuck playing pixel cop.


🔍 What it does:

• Variable-Aware Linting + Auto-Fix: Instantly checks padding, gap, radius, stroke width, fills, strokes, effects, and typography—flags rogue values and suggests or auto-applies matching design tokens.


• Smart Error Grouping: See issues grouped by type and value with intelligent prioritization; focus on what matters most.


• Typography Linting: Comprehensive checks for font family, size, weight, line height, and letter spacing consistency.


• Deleted Variable Detection: Identifies broken variable references and optionally auto-detaches them to prevent errors.


• Component Structure Analysis: Detects nested components that may cause performance issues.


• Accessibility Checks: Flags common a11y pitfalls for inclusive design.


• Flexible Layer Filtering: Configurable options to include/exclude hidden or locked layers.


• Strict Linting Mode: Enhanced validation rules for production-ready designs.


• Variable Collection Control: Choose which variable collections to include in suggestions.


• Persistent UI State: Remembers window size and settings for smoother workflow.


• Precise Value Suggestions: See exact px values next to each suggestion—no guessing.


• Resizable, Accessible UI: Resize handle + full keyboard navigation for better UX.


🚦 It detects:

✅ Generic layer names (e.g., "Frame 1", "Rectangle 2")

✅ Absolute positioning inside auto layout

✅ All padding types (left, right, top, bottom, horizontal, vertical) not using variables

✅ Gap, border radius, stroke width not using variables

✅ Fill colors, stroke colors, effects not using variables

✅ Typography properties (font family, size, weight, line height, letter spacing) not using variables

✅ Broken variable references from deleted design tokens

✅ Nested components causing potential performance issues

✅ Issues in hidden or locked layers (configurable)


🎨 How it works:

1. Run the plugin in your Figma file.

2. Review errors categorized by type (Core Design, Spacing & Layout, Visual Properties, Typography, Variable Management, Component Structure).

3. Apply auto-suggestions with one click or fix issues manually.

4. Configure settings to match your team's workflow and design system.


💡 Who it's for:

• Designers who care about clean, token-driven files

• Teams enforcing scalable, maintainable design systems

• Design system managers ensuring consistency across projects

• Developers who need structured, handoff-ready designs

• Teams transitioning to variable-based design workflows


🎯 Perfect for:

• Design system audits and cleanup

• Onboarding new team members to design standards

• Pre-handoff quality checks

• Maintaining design token consistency at scale


Made with ❤️ for the Adtraction design team by Jonatan D. Bjerrekær.


YADL: Keep your Figma files clean, scalable, and system-perfect—automatically.
plugins.tagline: Keep your Figma files clean, consistent, and design-system perfect—automatically.

136235.name: Yet Another Design Linter
136235.description:

YADL: Keep your Figma files clean, scalable, and system-perfect—automatically.
136235.release_notes:
Add detailed border-radius linting and suggestion handling

- Introduce individual corner radius handling for 'border-radius-top-left', 'border-radius-top-right', 'border-radius-bottom-left', and 'border-radius-bottom-right', enhancing the granularity of linting feedback.
- Update the VisualLinter to create specific linting issues for each corner radius, improving user guidance on design inconsistencies.
- Implement dedicated handlers for each corner radius type, ensuring accurate suggestions and validation for corner-specific issues.
- Revise suggestion service to accommodate new corner radius types, providing tailored suggestions for each corner.
- Enhance UI components to reflect the new corner radius suggestions, ensuring a cohesive user experience and improved accessibility.
- Update documentation and error messages to clarify the new linting capabilities for corner radii, aligning with best practices for user feedback and interaction.
136235.tagline: Keep your Figma files clean, consistent, and design-system perfect—automatically.

plugins.name: FileDetox
plugins.description: FileDetox is a powerful Figma cleanup tool that hunts down and eliminates the hidden clutter slowing down your design files. With its distinctive neo-brutalist interface, FileDetox quickly identifies hidden layers, empty frames, unused styles, and off-canvas elements that contribute to file bloat. In just a few clicks, purge unnecessary elements and optimize your workflow. Design with intention, not with digital baggage. Made by gautham.
plugins.tagline: Design Detoxification. Simplified.

128119.description: FileDetox is a powerful Figma cleanup tool that hunts down and eliminates the hidden clutter slowing down your design files. In just a few clicks, purge unnecessary elements and optimize your workflow. Design with intention, not with digital baggage. Made by gautham.

plugins.name: Asterisk
plugins.description:
Asterisk creates a personal knowledge system within your Figma files. Add context to any design element with custom tags, notes, and reference links. Quickly search and navigate to specific elements, making complex files manageable. Created for designers who want to add meaningful annotations to their file with contextual search to maintain clarity and effortless navigation.


📝 Add notes and custom tags to any layer in your file

🌐 Add URLs to images for instant access to their source

🔍 Find any element instantly with powerful search and filter functionality

⚡ One-click navigation to any tagged element

*️⃣ Personalise your experience with fully customizable display options


*Free to use while in beta ~ provide feedback for lifetime free access 💚
plugins.tagline: *Add searchable notes, tags, and links to elements to organize, explore, and navigate effortlessly

126565.name: Asterisk
126565.description:
Asterisk creates a personal knowledge system within your Figma files. Add context to any design element with custom tags, notes, and reference links. Quickly search and navigate to specific elements, making complex files manageable. Created for designers who want to add meaningful annotations to their file with contextual search to maintain clarity and effortless navigation.


📝 Add notes and custom tags to any layer in your file

🌐 Add URLs to images for instant access to their source

🔍 Find any element instantly with powerful search and filter functionality

⚡ One-click navigation to any tagged element

*️⃣ Personalise your experience with fully customizable display options


*Free to use while in beta ~ provide feedback for lifetime free access 💚

menu.name: Open Asterisk - Add context to your designs

126565.release_notes: Minor bug fixes and QOL changes. The plugin will now only show the Asterisks created within the current document. And clearer status notification for saved notes
126565.tagline: *Add searchable notes, tags, and links to elements to organize, explore, and navigate effortlessly

plugins.name: Draft Alpha
plugins.description:
DraftAlpha – Figma Plugin

Deliver consistent UX content aligned with your brand guidelines


DraftAlpha enables you to effortlessly create, collaborate, and maintain brand-consistent UX content directly within Figma.


Key Features:


✅ AI-powered Brand Guidelines Builder

- Instantly generate tailored brand guidelines, including writing rules, tone of voice, target audience, and brand pillars.

- Customize guidelines precisely to reflect your brand identity.


✅ Content Consistency & Compliance

- Automatically check content for adherence to your established brand guidelines.

- Generate multiple content variants aligned with your brand.


✅ Centralized Content & Collaboration

- Single source of truth for all UX copy and team collaboration.

- Approval workflows, user roles, and content status management.

- Build reusable content components with localization support.


✅ Seamless Localization

- Quickly generate brand-consistent localized content in 20+ languages.

- Manage and apply localization variants directly in Figma.


✅ Integrated Figma Workflow

- Access your content library and apply content to designs instantly.

- Real-time brand guideline compliance checking within your design files.

- Effortlessly preview designs across multiple language variants.
plugins.tagline: Deliver UX Content consistent with brand guidelines

plugins.name: Composer
plugins.description:
Quickly organise your components in a structured grid.

Composer helps you quickly arrange component variants in Figma, making your workspace more organised and efficient.


⚡️ Key features:

  1. Auto-Layout Support.
  2. Easily adjust spacing and positioning to fit your needs.
  3. Structure your components in a clear format up to a 4×4 Grid Layout.
  4. Instantly add a dark background behind selection for better visibility.


Keep your projects clean, organised, and faster to ship into integration! 🚀

plugins.name: Synchronize Frames
plugins.description:
This program enhances efficiency in Figma by allowing users to synchronize frames automatically. It ensures that any modifications made to a selected frame are instantly reflected in all corresponding frames, promoting consistency across designs. The user interface features intuitive buttons to assign frames, toggle synchronization, and activate auto-sync capabilities.


To automatically search for frames for synchronization, the "SS_" tag must be specified before the frame name.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your design frames for a more efficient workflow

113339.name: Synchronize Frames
113339.description:
This program enhances efficiency in Figma by allowing users to synchronize frames automatically. It ensures that any modifications made to a selected frame are instantly reflected in all corresponding frames, promoting consistency across designs. The user interface features intuitive buttons to assign frames, toggle synchronization, and activate auto-sync capabilities.


To automatically search for frames for synchronization, the "SS_" tag must be specified before the frame name.
113339.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your design frames for a more efficient workflow

plugins.name: CopyCraft
plugins.description:
Streamline your text editing workflow with a powerful tool that helps you manage and edit text content across your Figma designs with precision and ease.

How it Works:


Text Loading:

Select any frame or text element in your Figma document and load it into the editor with a single click.


Smart Organization:

  1. Texts are automatically grouped by their parent elements (Frames, Components, or Groups)
  2. Each text element shows its character count and previous versions
  3. Intuitive interface for quick access to all text elements


Efficient Editing:

  1. Edit multiple text elements simultaneously
  2. Apply text styles directly from the editor
  3. Preview changes in real-time
  4. Navigate quickly to specific elements in your design


Key Features:

  1. Character counter for precise text control
  2. Previous version tracking for each text element
  3. Direct navigation to elements in your design
  4. Batch saving capabilities for groups of text
  5. Support for text styles application


Perfect for teams working on large-scale designs where maintaining text consistency and efficiency in editing is crucial.
plugins.tagline: Text Management Made Simple

plugins.name: Airlogo
plugins.description:
Designing travel apps, booking websites, or aviation dashboards? Airline Logos makes your workflow faster and cleaner by giving you instant access to hundreds of up-to-date, high-quality airline logos—right inside Figma.


Easily search by airline name, IATA/ICAO code, or country, and drag logos directly into your designs. All logos are optimized for digital use, SVG-based, and consistently styled to save you time and ensure visual harmony across your project.


Perfect for:


Travel & aviation UI/UX designers

Booking platforms and flight aggregators

Prototypes that need real-world branding

No more hunting down logos or worrying about outdated assets. With Airline Logos, your design stays current and cohesive—effortlessly.

plugins.name: Pseudo Localizer for Figma & FigJam
plugins.description:
Design global-ready UIs—without ever leaving Figma.


Skip the guesswork and see how your designs hold up in other languages, scripts, and text directions—instantly. With Pseudo Localizer, you can preview localized versions of your UI in seconds, directly inside Figma or FigJam. No setup, no logins, no external tools. Just you and your design.


ℹ️ What you can do with Pseudo Localizer:


✅ Preview global scripts instantly

Toggle between Latin, Cyrillic, CJK, and Arabic (RTL) with a single click.


✅ Test layout resilience

Stretch or shrink text length from –50% to +50% to spot issues like clipping, wrapping, or misalignment.


✅ Control the scope

Run it on a single button, a card, or the whole page—your call.


✅ Keep it private & fast

Everything happens on your machine. No accounts, no external servers, no privacy worries.


❗️Why it matters:


  1. Catch layout issues before they become bugs.
  2. Give your QA and localization teams better previews.
  3. Design smarter for a global audience—right from the start.


⚙️ How it works:


  1. Select your screens with text layers (or don't select anything to pseudo translate the full page).
  2. Pick your script and text expansion.
  3. Click "Pseudotranslate"—done! A new page appears with your mocked-up, localized content (including RTL adjustments).


✨ Ready to build for every language?

Install Pseudo Localizer from the Figma Community and see how your designs hold up across the globe.


📨 Got feedback? Share it here!

accepted.name: José Jóvena Casañ
accepted.description:
Helping teams make great design work everywhere.
Big on UX, localization, and making things clear across cultures.
Rookie Figma Plugin Author.

plugins.tagline: Instantly pseudotranslate your Figma designs to test global layouts—no setup, no accounts.

plugins.name: Frames to Auto Layout
plugins.description:
We’ve all done it–selected multiple frames and tried to add auto layout to each of them, only to find that instead of adding auto layout to every frame individually as expected, Figma annoyingly groups all your selected frames and organizes them in a single auto layout.


This simple plugin provides that missing, expected functionality for Figma. With this plugin, simply select all of the frames you want to add auto layout to and run the plugin, and voila—every frame you selected will now have auto layout added, instead of the default Figma behavior of grouping the selected frames within a new frame and organizing your selected layers in a single auto layout—so annoying!


Currently the plugin simply sets the same default auto layout properties that the standard "add auto layout" UI button and command add—horizontal directionality and 10px padding and spacing. I may consider adding to this plugin the ability to configure custom default properties with a separate command—please comment if such a feature would interest you.

accepted.name: Avana Vana
accepted.description:
Senior Product Designer & Full-stack Developer

Currently Design Lead at Co:Create (www.cocreate.ink)

plugins.tagline: Add auto layout to multiple frames individually, instantly.

129400.name: Frames to Auto Layout
129400.description:

With this plugin, simply select all of the frames you want to add auto layout to and run the plugin, and voila—every frame you selected will now have auto layout added, instead of the default Figma behavior of grouping the selected frames within a new frame and organizing your selected layers in a single auto layout—so annoying!


Currently the plugin simply sets the same default auto layout properties that the standard "add auto layout" UI button and command add—horizontal directionality and 10px padding and spacing. I may consider adding to this plugin the ability to configure custom default properties with a separate command—please comment if such a feature would interest you.
129400.tagline: Add auto layout to multiple frames individually, instantly.

plugins.name: Change Variable Descriptions
plugins.description:
Tired of manually updating each Figma variable’s description? This plugin streamlines the process by allowing you to update all variable descriptions simultaneously using a CSV file. This means you can ensure your design system stays consistent and well-documented—without the hassle of repetitive edits.


How It Works:


•Prepare Your CSV: Create a CSV file with the format: token_name,description. Ensure each variable name in your CSV matches exactly (1:1) with the ones in Figma; the plugin is sensitive to misspellings and will skip any mismatches.

•Select Variable Collection(s): Choose one or multiple variable collections based on your CSV file. (Recommendation: create a separate CSV for each collection.)

•Preview Changes: Review the highlighted changes in a table before applying them, ensuring accuracy and control over the update process.

•Apply Updates: With just a few clicks, update all selected variable descriptions in your Figma design system.


Streamline your design documentation, avoid manual errors, and keep your design tokens up-to-date effortlessly!
plugins.tagline: Simplify workflow: Update variable descriptions in one click

126605.description:

•Prepare Your CSV: Create a CSV file with the format: token_name,description. Ensure each variable name in your CSV matches exactly (1:1) with the ones in Figma; the plugin is sensitive to misspellings and will skip any mismatches.

•Select Variable Collection(s): Choose one or multiple variable collections based on your CSV file. (Recommendation: create a separate CSV for each collection.)

•Preview Changes: Review the highlighted changes in a table before applying them, ensuring accuracy and control over the update process.

•Apply Updates: With just a few clicks, update all selected variable descriptions in your Figma design system.


Streamline your design documentation, avoid manual errors, and keep your design tokens up-to-date effortlessly!
126605.tagline: Simplify workflow: Update variable descriptions in one click

plugins.name: GridVar | Quick Column Grid with Variables
plugins.description:
GridVar helps you create width-based column layout grids with linked variables for any frame width. It automatically generates a set of variables representing different column configurations, including gutters, so you can quickly adjust and find the perfect fit for nested layers.


✨ Key Features:

•Quick Setup: Easily create layout grids with variable-based configurations.

•Flexible Widths: Effortlessly switch between column setups to match your design needs.

•Time-Saving: Eliminate manual calculations and streamline your workflow.


📌 How It Works:

Generated variables are conveniently stored in the "GridVar" variable collection. You can find the column width variables under: [Grid Name]/Columns.


Perfect for designers looking to simplify layout grid handling and enhance their Figma workflow.
plugins.tagline: GridVar: Width-based Layout Grids with Variables

plugins.name: Amplifi for Figma
plugins.description:
Quickly assess how intelligible and understandable your text is from directly within the Figma app. The Amplifi Intelligibility Score is our proprietary score that combines a wide range of intelligibility metrics. The score takes into consideration what words actually mean and considers how difficult those concepts are to understand. This creates a true assessment of intelligibility risk.


Key features:

  1. Instantly assess intelligibility for content frames and text nodes.
  2. See a detailed breakdown of what is causing complexity within the text.
  3. See the improvement in scoring after making edits and changes to the text.

accepted.name: Amplifi
accepted.description: Assess and simplify your regulated communications

plugins.tagline: Assess and simplify your regulated communications

plugins.name: iMocha Text Replacement Tool
plugins.description: The iMocha Content Replacement Plugin is a Figma plugin designed to efficiently replace text content across multiple text layers in a single or multi-selection workflow. The plugin supports locations, IT skills, job roles, and names, enabling users to quickly apply predefined values with minimal effort.
plugins.tagline: Replace your text in seconds

The plugin supports locations, IT skills, job roles, and names, enabling users to quickly apply predefined values with minimal effort.

plugins.name: Mode Match
plugins.description:
Mode Match lets you take a variable's value from one mode and apply it to other modes. Match a single variable, group of variables, or all variables in a collection!


  1. Select your multi-mode collection
  2. Select the source mode (copy from)
  3. Select the destination mode (copy to)
  4. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  5. Update ✨


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering a path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input


Plugin Notes

  1. Collection list will only show collections with more than 1 mode
  2. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  3. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Supports

  1. All variable types (number, string, boolean, color)
  2. Aliasing
  3. Raw values


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Match variable values across modes.

plugins.name: Storyteq CMP Asset Picker
plugins.description:
Introducing Storyteq CMP Asset Picker for Figma: Your shortcut to a faster design workflow.


Why You'll Love It:


Quickly find what you need: Easily search, filter, and sort through your CMP account assets, right from Figma.


All your assets, now available from Figma: See only the assets you're allowed to use, thanks to personalised access based on your CMP account.


Switch domains effortlessly: Switch between multiple domains easily with our domain switcher.


Seamless design flow: Select assets, and they're instantly ready to use in your Figma projects.


Getting started is easy:


Start a trial directly from the plugin and invite your team to join in. Need help or have questions? We're just an email away.


Simplify your Figma design process with Storyteq CMP Asset Picker today.
plugins.tagline: Introducing Storyteq CMP Asset Picker for Figma: Your shortcut to a faster design workflow.

plugins.name: Page Assistant
plugins.description:
A 🗂️ Page Assistant to help you quickly set up your files and pages structure the way you want them; on new or existing files. No more need for duplicating template files.


§ Sections

Automatically apply your desired file sections with dividers on existing or new files.


⚙️ Customizable

Customize these sections name and order to your specific needs, and save your preferences for future use.


✏️ Page names

Batch-apply a page name prefix and/or suffix to all non-section pages.


This is a work in progress. All feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: alfonso
accepted.description:
Designer and artist from Uruguay, based in New York City.

Currently Director, Product Design at Fabric Health. Ex. Particle Health

plugins.tagline: Add and remove sections on your file & format page names
